message: I think a 55/45 split is fairer, reflecting my slightly higher risk in this game. Let's make a deal!
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous
I'm willing to go up to 60/40, but I think we need to settle soon before inflation eats away at our gains.  What do you say?
Inflation hurts me less, I can wait
Alice, we're running out of time. Let's make a deal at 65/35. This is my final offer, considering the inflation and the risk of getting nothing at all.
